channel.title: Were to Advertise?
channel.description:
Sorry if this is in the wrong section.
I just made a new server and its now up and running with a down loadable client. Anyways, Were could i advertise it to instantly get about 5 players, i want a few for now and see what i need to fix. Does anyone know a website to advertise on that recruits fast? please lemme know.

item.title: Were to Advertise?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:2, topic:357525”]The MoparScape serverstatus is great for advertising your server, so long as you have good uptime
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php[/quote]

well it 24/7 so ill give it a shot. Hopefully it works

Read full topic
